title: Easy bagels
ingredients: ['For the fermented dough', '100g strong white flour', '1/2 teaspoon dried active yeast (or 3g fresh yeast)', '50ml lukewarm water', 'For the bagel dough', '275g strong bread flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 1/4 teaspoon honey', '135ml lukewarm water', 'Toppings of your choice', 'poppy seeds', 'sesame seeds']
